content: Hello! You’ve reached XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services?
I think I might have the wrong number, I was trying to reach my doctor’s office.
No problem at all! This is XYZ Home Services, we handle home plumbing, electrical, and HVAC needs. Would you like me to mark your number as a wrong contact so you won’t be disturbed again?
